lender.name: Ducky
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Godo
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can do for someone.

lender.name: J & J
lender.loan_because: We believe this to be the purest form of capitalism available. We pray that these people will be blessed in their endeavors.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference by helping others whenever and wherever I can...

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people
lender.occupational_info: When people are charged with a crime, they are assigned to an attorney who will help defend them. I work with the attorney to locate evidence that they did not do the crime.

lender.name: Johnson Family
lender.loan_because: Our 3 children, ages 6, 4, and 1, enjoy learning about what people are trying to do and helping them do it. We think it is great that people, with just a little bit of help, can work hard and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Father helps hospitals in America run more efficiently. Mother focuses on raising the children.

lender.name: Hansi
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to build up their own life.
lender.occupational_info: I´m an actress since my childhood. I earn enough money to live a very good life. I want to share my luck with other not so lucky people in our world. Take care and good luck to you all!

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: My young son and I would like to help others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: This is an exciting way to teach my children about the world we share and to support others in a positive way.

lender.name: Bailey
lender.loan_because: I'm a good boy
lender.occupational_info: wag-tastic

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I hope to help people earn a living.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a city government, trying to help citizens understand better their government and their role in determining the future of their lives and their community.

lender.name: j.w.
lender.loan_because: James 1:27
lender.occupational_info: Christian action ....let others see Jesus.

lender.name: Breanna
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to support others who are working to make a better life for themselves and enrich their local community/economy.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently at home raising my daughters.

lender.name: B & B
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great organization. For such small amounts, we can help people make a living or realize a dream.

lender.name: Roger-Avenida:Friends
lender.loan_because:
THE KIVA TORCH
When asked if we could lend a hand To others with a need The choice to help the Kiva way Became a gift indeed
But soon we'd learn the greater gift Was given unto "we" From all who sought their funding needs Yet asked for nothing free
For each a story filled with hope Our chance to change a life A small amount to reach one's dream To rise above their strife
The gift we send that holds the flame Which lights prosperity To one in need who soon returns The brightened flame to "we"
And basking in its' warmth and glow Now others changed for good Their joy, their pride, their gift to us This Torch for greater good
And on we hope to pass this Torch Again and yet again To all who pass within its’ light A gift we’ll each retain
Roger Van Wie, Kiva Lender For "We - The Friends of Avenida" 2010
lender.occupational_info: Stock Options Trader

lender.name: Fabiola
lender.loan_because: I am happy to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student of Journalism at the University of British Columbia.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am semi retired.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare

lender.name: Dean & Kristy
lender.loan_because: We're privileged to have enough resources that we can help our neighbors in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: In addition to being IUPUI grads, we both work in healthcare - Dean as a biomedical equipment technician and Kristy as a registered nurse.

lender.name: Gavin
lender.loan_because: I want to do good and make money. Donations are basically promoting people to do nothing to get something. In this form of giving, people are forced to use their own efforts to succeed. That, I agree with.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I am like so super nice. And Awesome. And a good dancer.
lender.occupational_info: Boring!!!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Women have a hard time getting loans from traditional establishments.

lender.name: TheStoneWriter
lender.occupational_info: I put Smiles on peoples faces. I hand carve Customized Unique and Personal names and Art on Stone in 4 mins . I also make business card holders and jewelry boxes, incense burners, and ashtray and much more.

lender.name: Zawadi by Youth
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of high school students trying to help the world in ways we see as possible and positive.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for an opportunity to help people grow their business and reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: College registrar and administrative assistant instructor.

lender.name: Maddie
lender.loan_because: I know what it must feel like to have to ask a stranger to loan you so you can make a living.
lender.occupational_info: You sit in a chair in a classroom talk, and you learn.

lender.name: Steffie
lender.loan_because: it is the most effective way I can touch another person's life.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I want to give people opportunities that I have had. Life is great - we should share the wealth.

lender.name: Brandi and Ryan Urie
lender.loan_because: We loan because we like the idea of helping people continue to be self-sufficient. We believe in giving a hand up, not a hand out- which is exactly what Kiva does!
lender.occupational_info: Ryan is an Assistant Language Teacher in the JET program. Brandi works for an Ekaiwa (or English Speaking school) part-time.

lender.name: Erin and Matt
lender.loan_because: we saw the need firsthand during our travels.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I own a small business and I want to see others like me succeed in their endeavors!

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I currently take care of the elderly in a nursing home. I help them with activities that they can't do themselves.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: I am idealistic. I am also fascinated by stories of how this little capital changes the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a technology company. Someday I would like to operate a small business.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I get paid to make people laugh.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I love to help and I love learning about people and places across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office and look at a screen all day. When I'm not at work, I dance, I write, I read, and I make jewellery.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money for me will make a world of difference for someone who wants to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a Foreign Language- mostly to Spanish speaking adults who are new to the US.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is a sustainable way to address poverty
lender.occupational_info: I am constantly trying to learn more about Latin America and poverty

lender.name: Harley Sears
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Guide the professional career of artists in the music business.

lender.name: Mei
lender.loan_because: I can. If I can do something to help, then why not?

lender.name: Kelly Natasha
lender.loan_because: 'We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop.'
lender.occupational_info: I work with children aged 3 to 5 in a nursery school, supporting them in learning and play.

lender.name: Victor A. Roestad
lender.loan_because:
I believe the resources people have isn't always acompanied with money. So in order for people to be able to take advantage of there resources they need a little financial help.
Recourceful people is what makes the world go around, so lending those people money will better a global situation.
In general I believe that people do NOT have to be poor for others to be rich.

lender.name: Nemo
lender.loan_because:
Proverbs 19:17 - He who has pity on the poor gives to the Lord, and the Lord will give him his reward.
And why on this way: Exodus 22:25 - If you let any of the poor among my people have the use of your money, do not be a hard creditor to him, and do not take interest.

lender.name: Calen
lender.occupational_info: valet driver

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I believe in them..

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It can make a real difference.
lender.occupational_info: Insurance Companies also need insurance. I help that process.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I have food, shelter, a job and a good family and can share some of what I have.
lender.occupational_info: Customer service, helping families, friends and communities to feed one another by providing superior seeds, tools, information and service

lender.name: Fabi
lender.loan_because: lending money is also about trusting in people, trusting in their abilities, boosting their self-esteem

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being connected to other people around the world and to affect their lives in a positive way.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to represent the state in appeals from criminal convictions. It is important to have a fair criminal justice system and I am a part of that process.

lender.name: Daniel Husserl
lender.loan_because: People who desire positive change need a vehicle to expedite that change. Our loans fuel that vehicle.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses reduce their energy and water use, and their waste production. I teach them how this will save money, so they have a drive to continue on this more enlightened business path.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I believe in opportunity and effort

lender.name: Francesca
lender.loan_because: If you see a hungry man don't give him rice: teach to cultivate

lender.name: Rich & Nan
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people across the world.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: The Godfather told me to.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I wish to help others make a better life

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupation: nonprofit for the arts and environment

lender.name: Gary X
lender.loan_because: I know I can help people directly, rather than anonymously via a large charitable agency. It's nothing to add $25 to my account whenever I can and put that money to work making someone else's life a little better...
lender.occupational_info: I create and design artwork/communications for printing and web sites for the worldwide web.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Got motivated after reading God Wants You To Be Rich by Paul Zane Pilzer.
lender.occupational_info: Real estate company.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I have learned that whatever I have is enough, and no matter how little or how much I give, still there is enough. Making this loan is a small way of expressing gratitude for my many blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired educator. For over thirty years I was privileged to work with children as their school librarian. In that capacity I was charged with providing materials to support and enrich the curriculum and to introducing students to a variety of resources for information My personal goal was to instill in each child the pleasures found in reading books.

lender.name: MANISH
lender.loan_because: I HAVE STARTED MY OWN BUSINESS OF WEBSITE, WHICH IS A PROPERTY PORTAL NAME INDIASPROPERTUGURU.COM, I HAVE ALREADY INVESTED SOME AMOUNT BUT NEED SOME MORE MONEY FOR THE BETTERMENT OF THE SAME.
lender.occupational_info: AS INDIA IS GROWING AND INDIAN ECONOMY AND INFRASTURE IS ALSO GROWING, SO THE SCOPE AND POTENTIAL IS HUGE IN PROPERTY PORTAL.

lender.name: Daniela
lender.loan_because: i barely use the money i have! So why not give it to hardworking people who deserve it? Kiva is my new piggy bank...don't need a bank account anymore! I usually dumpster dive...thrift shop, work for food and a place to stay, and barter with friends. my lifestyle allows me to give, and i'm so happy to find a place where i can make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I am majoring in earth science/geography with a sustainability concentration. When i'm not at school...i'm working a few part time jobs, or hanging out and volunteering at a local sustainable/organic farm. I love music, dancing, reading and DIY projects. I have a garden and i am currently learing about vermiculture. Oh, and i play d'jembe. For me..there is nothing better than spending a day out in the field, then coming home, preparing a delicious meal with friends and bringing the day to a close with a nice jam session !

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: the stories I read impact my life. A small loan is such an easy way to (hopefully) mirror that impact back to its source.
lender.occupational_info: I study the development of language and speech disorders.

lender.name: Maarten
lender.loan_because: Why not view the world as a global village where neighbours help each other out? There's enough food and resources for everyone... let's share!
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse and work with people who are physically and mentally handicapped.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Microlending empowers. Thanks to Kiva I can take part.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good forture and like to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I write software documentation for Microsoft.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am in college, studying international affairs.

lender.name: Hayder
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing.
lender.occupational_info: Originally from Pakistan, I now live in US with my wife and four kids.

lender.name: Kofi Sarfo
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to do so. There are many hard working people who deserve access to credit. This is encouraging.
lender.occupational_info: I make computer applications for various clients in the UK.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: Doing everything I can to help the people who truly need help.
lender.occupational_info: Working with people to help get the message of a product to lots of people.

lender.name: Drexden
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and must share.

lender.name: Tracie
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand at one time or another. I want to help because I can and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a busy office that verifies backgrounds on different types of business so that they can be okayed for loans. On my own time I write stories.

lender.name: Hella
lender.loan_because: I want other people to have a good life too!

lender.name: nicola
lender.loan_because: Kiva is fabulous and I love to help people and keep helping to support worthy causes.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Design Technology in an inner city high school, it is challenging a times, but mostly enjoyable.

lender.name: Noortje
lender.loan_because: I believe in microcredits...

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to make a good living of their own
lender.occupational_info: I'm payed to defend rights and needs of old people making use of a computer and most important. a calculator.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's a beautiful thing to do, I feel like I'm connected to others in a meaningful way and for someone with not a lot of disposable income, it allows me to have an impact.
lender.occupational_info: I help people live happier lives.

lender.name: Jason and Emma
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world." -- Gandhi

lender.name: Ganesh & Vinitha
lender.loan_because: I believe in returning back to the society in a small way and help develop a stronger and beautiful world.
lender.occupational_info: Developing software applications that will help simplify work.

lender.name: PabloBM
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves. Kiva.org is the answer to my doubts on how to effectively make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Toine
lender.loan_because: I believe that true improvement comes from seting up business and improving local infrastructure through the people themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for companies that need temporary support. For example managing a project or a department.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with so much, and I have it through entrepreneurial hard work and dedication. This cause is dedicated to helping those who have taken the steps to help themselves rise above in their part of the world.

lender.name: DresserTop Foundation
lender.loan_because: We add up all of our pocket change periodically and use it to help people grow their businesses and better support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family who wants to help other families. My husband and I want our kids to see even small amounts of giving can reap big rewards around the world. We support people who have ideas of how to rise up out of poverty.

lender.name: Ed Cook
lender.occupational_info: I work and study at Australia's top business school. I advise students looking to develop careers in Management Consulting. I'm also half way through studying for an MBA.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I believe that poverty can be significantly reduced in the next 20 years, but takes individuals to take the steps necessary for it to happen.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I support the free market, and empowering individuals to change their lives according to their own vision.
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate industry

lender.name: Shameema
lender.loan_because: I believe that we can all make a difference. I believe that it's possible to make poverty history if we all work together and lend a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: My work encompasses many things but i like to believe that it is all directed in helping humanity and trying to make a difference in a positive way.

lender.name: Djana
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves an opportunity to work and take care of their family. Entrepreneurship is the way to go!

lender.name: Norma,Douglas&Ariel
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to connect with people in other parts of the world and share with them in an effective way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a public library; my husband, Douglas, is a musician and climate change activist. His daugher, Ariel is a student.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to need help.
lender.occupational_info: I use technology to teach. My main job is creating educational materials for people to use over the internet (web-based courses, tutorials, etc.).

lender.name: Paul Eres
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to put extra money to use for people.
lender.occupational_info: I create downloadable games and sell them through digital download. I also do some freelance writing.

lender.name: angela
lender.loan_because: it's such an easy process and it's a good thing to do.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: A little means a lot.....

lender.name: Tinne
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: We're all connected on this crazy, amazing planet.

lender.name: Mary Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in need and make a change in their lives.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher at an international school. I teach students from all over the world. It is an amazing opportunity to see the world and meet people from all walks of life.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: "What you give, is yours for good. What you keep is lost forever." ~ Monsieur Ibrahim

lender.name: William Griggs
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info:
William Griggs is an interactive consultant and entrepreneur from Nashville, Tennessee. He is a graduate of Emory & Henry College and Brentwood Academy preparatory school.
Over the past 4 years, William has worked with CentreSource, Spheris, Inc., the Tennessee Bun Company, My College Road Trip and Suineg Consulting.
Currently, William is in the process of starting giveyear, a social enterprise he is incubating in the Nashville Entrepreneur Center that seeks to change the world by harnessing the talents of our nation's most promising future leaders and providing them with an opportunity to serve.
In addition to his interactive work, William is a dog lover, avid reader, and a dreamer

lender.name: Gabriela
lender.loan_because: i want to support sustainability. I am tired of being angry at globalization and i am tired of complaining about imperialism, instead i am ready to be proactive and make a real difference. i loan because i believe that these entrepreneurs have the ability to succeed and create a better future for their children.
lender.occupational_info: Artivist. someone who uses art and creativity as a way to actively make a difference around her. my goal is to inspire and empower folks to be creative in their choices and to see themselves as active agents of society who have the power to make a difference in their lives and in the world.

lender.name: Denice
lender.loan_because: i am touched by these stories of success and the hope for a better future.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the non profit industry, raising money for my Community Center and our programs. Hawaii is considered paradise but we still have our social and economic problems.

lender.name: Tara
lender.occupational_info: Help people make their homes or businesses beautiful.

lender.name: Ray S.
lender.loan_because: I believe a little goes a long way in the right hands. Making the world a better place should start at the bottom, not the top.
lender.occupational_info: Just a hardworking, family loving blue collar guy. I have much in common with the good people I want to help.

lender.name: Lorthy
lender.loan_because: Us is We and We is Me.

lender.name: Douglas and Allison
lender.loan_because: We can!
lender.occupational_info: Douglas reads and writes about networking technology for a telecommunications company. Allison works in university relations.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I believe in people. I hope that each person will become the best person they can be. The world is really a very small place and we are all in this together. I am particularly interested in helping people who are working on native crafts. I have an art degree along with my masters degree in social work. I hope that this may help people save a bit more of there cultural as they become independent.
lender.occupational_info: I help people grow. I help people who have emotional problems.

lender.loan_because: i want to start an institute for women to develop there skill and i l teach diffrent courses for women to earn there own income. i am basically artist and i l teach no.of atrs and crafts,beautician course also.

lender.loan_because: I need a loan for purchase of land for farm.
lender.occupational_info: Now, i am start a new farm.

lender.loan_because: ı vant to open my oven jop

lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the individual spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I encourage young people.

lender.name: John and family
lender.loan_because: I am called to make a difference, and I want my children to learn how to.

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: It changes the dynamics of the world.

lender.name: yuval shwartsman
lender.loan_because: i love to see peoples dreams fullfiled

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: J.P. Davis
lender.loan_because: it's a great idea and a great way to help people who work hard.
lender.occupational_info: I help move mission and priorities forward at the University of Louisville.

lender.name: Catarina
lender.loan_because: We Care a Lot

lender.name: OnTimeAirFilters.com
lender.loan_because:
As a startup, we value the entrepreneurial spirit and understand how starting one's own business can be a dream-come-true. Kiva's loan recipients demonstrate that spirit and work hard to develop sustainable businesses that will support themselves, their families and their communities. We understand the hardships that new businesses face and want to help give these entrepreneurs in developing countries the chance to achieve their dreams.
As successful entrepreneurs, we feel it is our obligation and privilege to give back to those who are just getting started. We believe that successful business started with Kiva micro-financing go on to create successful communities with a higher quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: We offer a subscription service for air conditioner and furnace filters. Our goal is to make keeping your HVAC units in tip-top condition, without ever having to think about it!

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I want people to realize what they are capable of given the chance.

lender.name: CosMind
lender.loan_because: i love.
lender.occupational_info: i make stuff.

lender.name: Walt
lender.loan_because: I am paying forward the help that others have given to me.

lender.name: larrin
lender.loan_because: I enjoy teaching others how to fish!

lender.name: Rex
lender.loan_because: it's more effective than a hand out. And it feels good too.
lender.occupational_info: I produce records.

lender.name: STC Saints
lender.loan_because: To help support others and help them to achvieve their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I teach a 9th grade Global Issues class. This lending group is composed of students wanting to make a difference

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I know the importance of getting a little bit of support when it's most needed.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small independent coffee shop in Toronto. Serving freshly baked goods and espresso drinks.

lender.name: Kit
lender.loan_because: it's one small way I can try to make a difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: New York Land Man
lender.loan_because:
We want to help entrepreneurs help improve their own lives without being limited by access to capital. Through kiva, we hope to bypass the endemic corruption and wasteful administration costs of aid programs and efficiently assist the working poor to become successful.
We encourage kiva donors to check the portfolio yields of the field partners. There are plenty of field partners with 20% and under portfolio yields.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I believe in people who are motivated to take care of themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I was in real estate sales for eleven years. Now I take care of my home and my family.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.occupation: After school Teacher in Beverly Hills

lender.name: Chess
lender.loan_because: I reap emotional, social and financial rewards when I do so.
lender.occupational_info: I've spent 10+ years managing the production of books, magazines and other sundry periodicals. Now I run my editorial services self-proprietorship. For several years, I've studied how to design and install solar power systems. Photovoltaics is one of the best ways that people can harness the power of the sun for clean, renewable energy.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: My cousin introduced me to Kiva and gave my family the opportunity to begin lending. What a wonderful way to help others in the world!

lender.name: Antonello
lender.loan_because: antonello@formatc.it

lender.name: Emanuel Teles
lender.loan_because: Please, Help this people. I litle of money make the diferrence for this people. Let's go help him!

lender.name: Ed F.
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to provide an opportunity for others to become independent. Sharing some of what I've gained, will hopefully allow others to share what they gain.
lender.occupational_info: Occupational Therapist...I help people return to work after they've been injured.

lender.name: M Jean
lender.loan_because: What a great way to help people, without being a big institution to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired; I do therapy swimming, play my keyboard at a rehabilitation place, and at a home for older people. Do a lot of volunteer work at the church; fill in at piano and organ when needed.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: Galatians 5:14, The entire law is summed up in a single command: "love your neighbor as yourself."

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe it is my duty as a humanoid to give to the world. My declared mission is to change the lives of 25,000 people every month, and we, so far, change about 5,000 lives every month through donations of time and money. I see the opportunity with Kiva as a natural extension of that goal.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses.

lender.name: Traveling Sparrow
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to empower those on a global level who would not otherwise have the opportunity to support their family. I believe that KIVA
lender.occupational_info: I own a tea company that I have started myself. I pledge to make a difference locally and globally through my business.

lender.name: Jason Tiller
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs A opportunity and A chance to better their life, If someone takes the step to better themselves then we have to support them :)

lender.name: Pat
